message: Hi Bob! Since you'll be affected by a higher inflation rate (20%) than me (5%) if we delay, it makes sense to agree now. I'm offering you a substantial portion that acknowledges our different situations while being fair to both of us.

Hi Alice, given the higher inflation rate affecting me, I believe a 50-50 split is fair at this point. It balances out our different inflation rates and ensures we both get a reasonable share before the value decreases further for me. What do you think?
